Producer: Robert Farrelly, Peter Farrelly, Bradley Thomas, Charles B. Wessler
Screenwriter: Robert Farrelly, Peter Farrelly, Sean Moynahan
Sound Mix: Dolby SR, DTS, Dolby Stereo, Surround, Dolby A, Dolby Digital
Synopsis: The story revolves around Hal (Jack Black) who, taking his dying father's advice, dates only the embodiments of female physical perfection. But that all changes after Hal has an unexpected run-in with self-help guru Tony Robbins. Intrigued by Hal's shallowness, Robbins hypnotizes him into seeing the beauty that exists even in the least physically appealing women.
Title: Shallow Hal
